::DarkMouse::

She dreams of walking in the forest and passing by a strange bot. One 
who is part snake and part scorpion.  She looks at and thinks it's 
dead.  She keeps walking and finds a huge spider who fires on her. 
She is hit and falls.  She then sees herself flying over the 
landscape.  She flies over a ship.  It was heavily damaged and had 
huge gaping holes in the sides.  She keeps flying and passes 
mountains, rivers, lush green valleys.  Then all is dark.  She enters 
dreamless sleep.
